message:
Annual Budget – Approved Notification

Dear {{ doc.owner }},

We are pleased to inform you that your submitted annual budget for the upcoming financial year has been approved. The approval marks the completion of the planning phase for your cost centre(s) and confirms the allocation of funds for the new fiscal period.

Budget Summary

  • Budget Document: {{ doc.name }}
  • Financial Year: {{ doc.fiscal_year }}
  • Cost Centre: {{ doc.cost_center }}
  • Expense Account: {{ doc.expense_account }}
  • Status: {{ doc.workflow_state }}

Next Steps:

  • Implementation: Proceed with procurement and expenditure activities in line with the approved budget.
  • Monitoring: Regularly track your spending and variances through the ERP system’s Budget vs Actual reports.
  • Compliance: Ensure all expenditures follow the financial governance and approval limits set by the organization.
  • Amendments: Any future adjustments must follow the established budget revision process.

You may view your approved budget document using the link below:

View Approved Budget

{% if comments and comments[-1] %}

Last comment: {{ comments[-1].comment }} by {{ comments[-1].by }}

{% endif %}

For detailed guidance, refer to the Budget Management Guidelines or contact the Finance Department.

Congratulations on the successful completion of your budget submission and thank you for your contribution to the financial planning process.
name: Budget
subject: New Budget

message:
New Budget Request Submitted – Review Required

Dear Budget Manager,

A new budget request has been submitted and requires your review. Please evaluate the request details and take the necessary action as per the organization’s financial procedures.

Request Summary

  • Request ID: {{ doc.name }}
  • Related Budget: {{ doc.budget }}
  • Cost Centre: {{ doc.cost_centre }}
  • Expense Account: {{ doc.expense_account }}
  • Amount Requested: {{ doc.amount_requested }}
  • Amended From: {{ doc.amended_from or "N/A" }}

Next Steps

  • Validate Accuracy: Ensure the amount requested aligns with the associated budget.
  • Check Justifications: Confirm proper reasoning exists for the amendment or new request.
  • Approval Routing: Route the request for further approvals or feedback if required.

You can view and manage this request in the ERP system using the link below:

Open Budget Request

{% if comments and comments[-1] %}

Last comment: {{ comments[-1].comment }} by {{ comments[-1].by }}

{% endif %}

For any clarifications, please refer to the Budget Guidelines Document or contact the Finance Department.

Thank you for ensuring the integrity and efficiency of the budgeting process.
name: New Budget Request
subject: New Budget Request

message:
Budget Created – Procurement Plan Required

Dear Procurement Team,

A new budget document has been created and submitted for the upcoming financial year. You are requested to prepare the corresponding Procurement Plan in line with the approved budget allocations for the cost centre indicated below.

Budget Summary

  • Budget Document: {{ doc.name }}
  • Financial Year: {{ doc.fiscal_year }}
  • Cost Centre: {{ doc.cost_center }}
  • Expense Account: {{ doc.expense_account }}
  • Status: {{ doc.workflow_state }}
  • Created By: {{ doc.owner }}
  • Created On: {{ doc.creation }}

Action Required:

  • 1. Review Budget Details: Review the approved or submitted budget to understand planned expenditure and funding allocations.
  • 2. Prepare Procurement Plan: Create the procurement plan corresponding to this budget, detailing expected procurements, timelines, and estimated values.
  • 3. Ensure Alignment: Verify that all proposed procurements correspond to budgeted accounts and cost centres.
  • 4. Submit for Approval: Once completed, submit the procurement plan through the ERP workflow for validation and approval.

You can access the budget document directly below:

View Budget Document

To initiate the procurement plan creation, click the link below:

Create Procurement Plan

{% if comments and comments[-1] %}

Latest note: {{ comments[-1].comment }} by {{ comments[-1].by }}

{% endif %}

For reference, please consult the Procurement Planning Guidelines or reach out to the Finance Department for clarifications regarding budget details.

Thank you for your prompt action and collaboration in ensuring timely alignment between budgeting and procurement processes.

Best regards,
Finance Department
name: Procurement plan from budget
subject: Please create a Procurement plan for new budget {{doc.name}}
